name: Amnesia Adventure Demo (Updated: 05-11-17)
description:
Amnesia Adventure is an adventure game about a retired adventurer travelling into their memories to solve a mystery. It is a collaborative project, and you are certainly welcome to contribute to it, at

github.com/double-fine-game-club/amnesia-adventure

This is a demo with a placeholder ending that was made for the end of the Amnesia Fortnight 2017. The project is still ongoing, and is completely collaborative. Anyone can submit anything they want, from art to music, to writing, to coding and anything in between. Everything is welcome. :D

Contributors:

See github.com/double-fine-game-club/amnesia-adventure for an up to date list of contributors and contributions

This game uses the MIT licensed Godot engine. Visit godotengine.org for more information.
